abstract: Plot of upcoming episode of longtime BBC radio show The Archers, which focuses on country life in British village of Ambridge, has divided show's audience over disturbing storyline involving domestic violence; episode features trial of woman charged with trying to kill her husband after years of abuse.

headline.print_headline: BBC Soap, Pushing 70, Generates a New Buzz With Its Abuse Thread
headline.main: BBC Soap ‘The Archers,’ Pushing 70, Generates New Buzz With Abuse Thread

snippet: Set in a rural village, the BBC soap opera keeps finding ways to remain relevant. The trial of a character charged with attempting to murder her abusive husband has much of the nation buzzing....
lead_paragraph: Set in a rural village, the BBC soap opera keeps finding ways to remain relevant. The trial of a character charged with attempting to murder her abusive husband has much of the nation buzzing.
